website_summaries.verdict: 2L version is a worthy value with some advanced features.
pros: Tank runs for 12 hours on high, so easily lasts through the night
Convenient moveable nozzle to direct vapor
Detachable power cable makes it easy to refill
cons: Design can make it a chore to clean

customer_reviews.title: Super trooper
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this because my skin was drying out in my room while I slept during the winter since I was using a small space heater. This is a total champ. One full tank can last at least 24 hours of use, and the mist is fine enough that even if I accidentally toss something near it or have a body part pass over the spout I won't feel the spray or have whatever is near it get wet. There is also a pleasant burbling sound that's reminiscent of of gentle rain, which is really great for lulling me to sleep. The burbling sound isn't aggressive enough to make me want to go pee.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Five stars, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this purchase! It is our second Anypro humidifier that we've purchased. This is the perfect size for our two year olds room. He LOVES the nightlight (what a great addition to a humidifier)! It is simple to use and keep clean. The amount of mist that comes out is perfect for an average size bedroom. Our son loves to turn settings on humidifiers, but we don't run into that problem with this humidifier since there isn't that option (perfect for a kids room, especially for a 2 year old!). I also love the timer option, so that it doesn't run all night.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime and Chad

customer_reviews.title: I don't wake up with a stuffy nose anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I don't wake up with a stuffy nose anymore! It's been a loooooong time since I've owned a humidifier and I don't know why I waited so long to buy one. I don't wake up with a stuffy nose when I use this, and it doesn't leak water all over the place like other ones I've used in the past. The on/off button is VERY sensitive and sometimes I inadvertently turn it on, but that's not a big deal because I just turn it right off. I love the pretty night light and the adjustable mist direction as well. All around A+++
customer_reviews.author: Knitorious

customer_reviews.title: Love ,love ,love this humidier..don't look any further and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: As with everything, I did quite an extensive amount of searching before purchasing a humidifier for my newborn daughter and am so glad we bought this one. My daughter started getting some congestion and we had to constantly put saline drops in her nose and suction them out. I heard about the benefits of having a humidifier and I can honestly say my daughter is 4 months old now and she hasn't been congested since we started using this product in her room. Make sure you fo clean it out after so many uses and you'll be fine. Thanks for a great product! Satisfied mom right here.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good one!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling to find a good humidifier in the local stores around us. I took a chance on this one and I am beyond satisfied! Bought one for myself and then ended up buying one for my girlfriend's family! I keep mine on the heavy mist and have not found any signs of leakage. I enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Scored F on FakeSpot
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the product as it stopped working after one day. When I placed the full reservoir on the base, the entire reservoir would drain out onto the floor. After multiple times messing around and adjusting the fit, it wouldn't drain. However, the mist didn't come out the top. Rather, a cloud of mist came out when the reservoir was lifted off the base. When looking around online for an answer, I realized it scored an F on FakeSpot.com meaning all these overwhelminglly positive reviews are fake. Don't waste your time and purchase a name brand (albeit more expensive) humidifier instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: My Humidifer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I needed something easy to handle and effective- hoping all goes well in the future which I feel it well. Seems well made and access to the company is wonderful from a consumer's standpoint. I am having trouble telling low mist from high- any recommendations would help. When I lightly touch the on off it seems to automatically go to high.
customer_reviews.author: Ms J

customer_reviews.title: just perfect humidity for my room
customer_reviews.text: I received this humidifier ( which was very smartly packaged ) and set it up in minutes. I then noticed immediate results. No more dry throat no more dry skin, just perfect humidity for my room. As for maintenance, it could not be easier. Rinse out the tank, wipe down the base and it’s good to go. This product is far superior and more reasonably price than any competing product. When you account for the fact that most humidifiers require filters, this is a no-brainer decision. Do yourself a favor and buy one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Returning this
customer_reviews.text: Made loud gurgling and dripping noises. I followed all directions exactly. Flat surface, purified water, cleaned it. This wasn't my first humidifier. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I like the light and the touch capacitance button on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier works as stated. The tank lasts all night and even during the day during his 3-4 hour nap and must be refilled every night. I like the light and the touch capacitance button on the front. My 3 year old loves that he can turn it off in the morning or in the afternoon after his nap! My wife and I have been well pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and dont last
customer_reviews.text: These seemed great in begining but then about couple months in the mildew and mold buildup is crazy and hard to clean. almost impossible to clean inside of the storage tank. Also the Ultrasonic disc in bottom of unit started flaking apart and peeling apart almost imedietly. its a cheap piece of metal with thin paint vs my Honeywell unit which lasted like 7 years till i dropped it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this humidifier last winter for my boyfriend who was having issues with the dry air. We were happy with the purchase. When the weather got less dry with the spring and summer, we put the humidifier away. We moved to a new apartment in the fall, and come winter we were looking to use the humidifier again. However, we realized we had lost the little cap. I contacted AnyPro to see if it was possible to purchase a replacement cap, and they informed be about their 1-year warranty. They send me a whole new humidifier, which arrived about a week later. This was all settled with a few quick emails. 5 stars for great customer service :]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’ve used it for awhile, I really like it. It is not much bigger than the small water bottle type. But being small it is easy to clean and fill, yet lasts all night long on high. Living in an area with hard water I empty whats left every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Very good humidifier, I've tried several of them
customer_reviews.text: Very good humidifier, I've tried several of them, this has excellent amount of storage (after one nigth the tank is still half full), I appreciate the control of the mist intensity, useful for larger rooms, and the blue light is relaxing and can be used of nice night light. I found it was easier to drop some water when setting it up compared to other humidifiers, but it's really just a matter to get used to it, so this would be at least 4.5 STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Pietro

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier, good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a pinch to replace our Crane humidifier and found this one is so much better!!! Very quiet, light is much less imposing than the Crane one we had. The two settings (low and high) are plenty for our needs and it's super easy to clean. Reservoir is big enough to run all night on high.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great, but small tank.
customer_reviews.text: Has very small tank. Will barely cover one night on high. Has a timer to shut off after 2, 4 , or 6 hours if you choose. Also has a nightlight option, but it is a blue light, so not the best for sleeping. We use them for the kids' rooms, but definitely prefer the larger version which we have for the living room area.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: It is not quiet
customer_reviews.text: It is not quiet as advertised. I have been using it for the last one week and it drives me crazy while I am falling a sleep. Then when I wake in the middle of the night I hear the dripping sound loud and clear, and I cannot sleep unless I turn it off. Otherwise cool mist works fine
customer_reviews.author: T. Sen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Unit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little unit, smaller then I expected but does the job very well. This is replacing a similar unit that lasted about a year before it finally died. We rely on these heavily to sleep at night due to the forced air AC and the fact our door has to be shut at night. Holds a lot more water then you think, easily made it through a 7 hour sleep night. Seller is awesome and provides a nice tip sheet to keep the unit running well, I wish I knew these with my first unit.....I may not have killed it so fast :)
customer_reviews.author: Enstormblue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first used a couple of times, put it up for a year brought it back out when I needed it, now won’t work. That’s just ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Works but didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this 4 stars for the very responsive customer service by the vendor. The product did work fine but the water level sensor broke after about 10+ days of use. Got a replacement very quickly after I contacted the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: AJ776523

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty, but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, but that's about it. It's not very effective. For about the same cost I can get one with a much larger tank that actually humidifies the air. I live in WI and we've been about -10 for a few weeks now, and our air is terribly dry. This tank will stay full for a few days, even being ran 24/7. My other humidifiers I've had to change twice a day because of how dry the air is. This may be good for a small space like a bathroom, but not for any living or sleeping quarters where you actually need it to add moisture to the air.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but I’m so disappointed with this product after many weeks of researching and contemplating which one to buy. I purchased this at the end of November and it worked great until about a month ago and then just stopped working. It didn’t even make it 5 months. I don’t know how to contact the company to try and reconcile this issue...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely rate this product as a 5 stars on a 5-star scale. I am impressed with the quality for the price. The humidifier is remarkably user friendly in regards to operation and maintenance. For its size, it is powerful but incredibly quiet. With the exception of a minor gurgling of water, it is essentially silent. Despite the warning of white dust formation due to the ultrasonic nature, I have not experienced this. Overall, I would recommend the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: K Hopland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean and looks good. 4 stars because it doesn't give off that much steam and after months of use, I really don't even notice a different and it's in a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: MnTwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Fan makes horrible noise after just one year
customer_reviews.text: After just one year of use, the fan broke and makes a horrible noise. Can't use it in baby's room anymore. Customer service refused to help in any way. Crap product, do Not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Surh

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is EXACTLY what I was looking for to replace a 30-year-old unit that was noisy and spewed moisture. The Anypro emits a wonderfully fine mist and is silent except for an occasional water gurgle. I use distilled water and the Anypro doesn't leave that nasty white residue on everything. The detachable cord is definitely a plus!
customer_reviews.author: PMH

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to get going. There was no filter, and it wasn’t messy. The only thing I had to do was add water and hit the power button. It works as a night light too. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I got this on a Prime Day deal. I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a Prime Day deal. I'm not sure I'd pay full price for this. It seems to function well, but it is definitely made cheaply, and I fear it may not hold up over time. Of course, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is one of the best things I've bought in a while! I'm 8 months pregnant and very congested. My doctor suggested medications, but I wanted to try this first. It works wonders at night and I haven't had to take any medications. Such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 4 out of 5. I purchased this humidifier for my newborn. I liked it so much I bought a 2nd one for his playroom. The only issue which is easily fixable is if you move it with water and it tilts it takes a moment for the humidifier to push more misty air out.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Henke

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and travel with
customer_reviews.text: Quite simple to use, adter using for aboyt a month I realized that it is nice for overnight use. I use only distilled water. The liquid container in this model is small if you want to use on the maximum setting, it will last about 6-7hrs. I will buy it again and perhaps even the bigger size for all day humidifier
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and weak
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using a previous larger version of this humidifier but this model (1) is small and doesn't output much mist or meaningfully change room humidity according to an indoor humidity gauge and (2) produces very loud water gurgling and bubbling sounds that kept me awake. The older version did not have these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mellin

customer_reviews.title: I rate my new cool mist humidifier a 4 out 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I rate my new cool mist humidifier a 4 out 5 stars. The only reason it didn’t get a 5 is because It has very small tank. While it gets the job done the tank only covers one night on high. I like the timer setting, allowing to shut off after 2, 4 , or 6 hours if you choose. The nightlight option is a blue light, so not the ideal for sleeping. Also abit louder then anticipated, but not unbearable. This small model is great for one small room. I also like how easy it is to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Balla

customer_reviews.title: Good little humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice space-saving unit for cold days when the heat is really running! We have enjoyed the extra humidity and the nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! It sits on my night stand every night. It puts out a steady stream of mist. The size is perfect to last all night. It's easy to fill and the base is perfect for rinsing out due to the plug port.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P. Eberts

customer_reviews.title: The low/high setting for mist is perfect for adjusting as needed
customer_reviews.text: I've used this humidifier for about 2 months. It works very well. The low/high setting for mist is perfect for adjusting as needed. I fill it about halfway and that lasts for about 7 hours at low setting. Haven't had any problems with mold but I dry it out during the day and use it at night. Perfect for a bedroom. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully for our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully for our bedroom. Notes say not to put oils directly in the tank... I read that after I did it, but no issues for a good 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: K. Francisco

customer_reviews.title: This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - the best humidifier we've owned...and we have had quite a few.
customer_reviews.author: W. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Buy a soft flexable bottle wand to help clean :)
customer_reviews.text: We have a wood stove in our house we needed on in the kids room and ours. We love it!! If we forget to fill it before bed we can tell the next day for sure! Cleaning is kinda tricky need a flexable bottle wand to really clean in the tank but over all we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie belles

customer_reviews.title: This is the best humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best humidifier . . . in terms of ease to use, clean, almost no noise and just plain cute in its design. I had one question on cleaning it and got a complete response, plus a video, the same day. Everyone today talks customer service but few actually provide it. I would recommend this humidifier and company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: needed this for my husband was small enough to travel with, worked great
customer_reviews.author: Harris-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughter in her dorm room. She needs the moisture because she is a singer.
customer_reviews.author: CJ1971

customer_reviews.title: I loved it so much I bought a second one for ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much I bought a second one for my office! It's easy to fill, doesn't spill easily, and I love not having to deal with a filter.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to clean. Smells of mildew. I have to clean it daily. If it’s not on, it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very very small. I highly doubt it covers a whole room. I wouldnt waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact humidifer that provides a long cool mist without much noise!
customer_reviews.text: The setup for this unit is standard and the cleanup is pretty easy. It comes with an included brush. All you have to do is fill up the unit, plug it in and let it run. It has a timer for 1, 3 and 6 hours. It also has a continuus function. I ran this for roughly 24 hours without a problem or need to refill which is nice. it runs pretty quiet and is really compact. Pros: - long lasting mist - small and compact - quiet (just a small bubbling noise) - timer is nice - neat little night light (hold the power button to turn on) Cons - not many
customer_reviews.author: LaZyGuN

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: It is very good, easy to use. The only problem is that I bought 2 and after 1 year, 1 stopped working - I would hope it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as desired.
customer_reviews.text: It works well, it's silent... what else do you need? When it runs out of water, the indicator isn't troublesome, so if it happens in the middle of the night, it won't keep you up.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Henning

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've ever ordered, soooo easy to use and reliable!!!
customer_reviews.author: IRENE BRENNAN

customer_reviews.title: died after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I've owned it for almost a year and used it maybe 15 times and it's already dead. Majorly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RFJames

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, impossible to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use and quiet. No leaking water for the month it was used. However mold grows where the mist comes out of and there is no way to clean it. It was returned after a month or use because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described works great! Love that I can easily turn the night light offx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: As described. Easy to use. Have used to 3 nights in a row no problem. Will update later with how cleaning goes. Use filtered water from fridge and so far no white residue.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not happy..
customer_reviews.text: The night light does not work. The threaded part where u fill the water keeps breaking off. I would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Quite Humidfier
customer_reviews.text: Here is my review on this product> 1. Timer for 1hr, 3hrs and 6 hr settings gives you risk free humidification. 2. Cool blue night light is giving good feel till you get sleep. 3. Noise less steam creates the room humidified within 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: mahendran

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Tank! You'll love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: HUGE Tank. Might be a little heavy to carry for some when full of water, but totally worth it! This thing is great! Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: PAUL J. LA CAPRIA

customer_reviews.title: Great for hotels
customer_reviews.text: Little bulky but very quiet and blue light is noce
customer_reviews.author: bradley gilman

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The light however is very bright I have to turn it against the wall so its not so light in the room at night
customer_reviews.author: Angie Barrantes

customer_reviews.title: Quiet humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Does drip awkwardly when removing the reservoir to flip over to fill, but that may just be a general thing with humidifiers (this is my first humidifier). Very quiet
customer_reviews.author: Markell Lewis

customer_reviews.title: We’ve had the humidifier for two weeks and love it! I love the 1
customer_reviews.text: On a scale of 1-5, I give it a 5! We’ve had the humidifier for two weeks and love it! I love the 1,3,6 hour timing function and the nightlight is very helpful. It’s perfect for my son’s room!
customer_reviews.author: Eliabeth

customer_reviews.title: Return my money
customer_reviews.text: Too small,ran out of water,too noisy,and dripping water. Very disappointed in product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Duca

customer_reviews.title: It releases a good amount of air on the highest setting and is ...
customer_reviews.text: The product has been exactly what we expected. It releases a good amount of air on the highest setting and is really quiet. We purchased two (one for baby bedroom) and one for the master and with two sick pepple in the house we are hoping it helps with the nighttime congestion
customer_reviews.author: Craig Coffaro

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't strong enough for our big bedroom. We didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't strong enough for our big bedroom. We didn't really notice a difference and the power button is illuminated all night. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this humidifier for my son's room and so far loving it! I've read so much about it before purchasing it and I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vazpayne1719

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Quiet and minimum light
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Quiet and minimum light. Only downside is it is too small for my bedroom. My bedroom is not large. It fits a king size bed with just enough room to walk around it.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier works really well. It requires no filter and easy to clean. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: VillageMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quiet and compact. Perfect for Office or bedroom. Love it and keeps the room cool and skin from drying up. Easy to clean. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: Love this! works well for bedroom, Easy to fill because cord disconnects from unit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Belsito

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: Originally gave it a one star because it broke after one day. However, the company sent a free replacement. The new one works good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product / illuminate in the night looks beautiful !
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Chu

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this humidifier. It is easy to clean, quiet and the water lasts throughout the night and most of the day. I also like the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you keep it clean
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it helps my breathing and dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started right up. Set timer til 3 hours. ...
customer_reviews.text: Started right up. Set timer til 3 hours. Can see the mist flowing into the room. No problems whatsoever. Now it's a matter of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Anypro humidifier because it is very quiet and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Anypro humidifier because it is very quiet and the size matches what I need. I rate it 5 score.
customer_reviews.author: Yen-Tzu C.

customer_reviews.title: Fight the flu!
customer_reviews.text: I rate this products quality 5 out of 5. I bought one because my GF has one, and I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not bulky and stylish enough to have visible in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked well other than a few gurgling sounds, but kind of soothing at times. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet. Easy to fill. It's pretty small and barely lasts the night on the high setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Receive it fast and it helps with my girl sinus.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthiayew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Served my purpose for size of room and runs quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Lare

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps rooms moist and last the whole night!!
customer_reviews.author: Ileane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, even bought a second one to diffuse essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Happy tableowner

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good humidifier, just very small. If you want a space saver and don't mind filling it up more often, this is the one for you. The company is great. They want to make sure you're happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our family doctor, didn't work out for us
customer_reviews.text: After using it for a few hours, we did not see a change of humidity in the smallish room where we tried the Cool Mist Humidifier. It had been specifically recommended by our family doctor but in our case we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: KBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: poor design. clunky and water comes out when you try to refill. Broke after falling off the night stand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic locking cap
customer_reviews.text: I like led the bounce nozzle on top for directing the mist. I did not like how thin/cheap the twist cap for the water undernearh was. Only used it for 4 days and my husband must have tightened it a touch too much and the whole thing broke into pieces and leaked everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Huenink

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this humidifier! At the same time if puts out a good amount of mist. It is quiet while it runs. You can also turn on and off the blue light.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Heidrick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good piece of garbage. After one day liking from everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK - Not Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Had this Humidifier for a couple of days now. If you're a light sleeper, it's probably not for you as it emits a low but audible whine when it's running. That's not so bad but during the night while it operates it produces some noises that might possibly awaken you: dripping internally; gurgling from time to time and some cracking sounds which makes it seem like the material used to manufacture it is either contracting or expanding. Other than the noise issues it operates fine and produces two different levels of mist.
customer_reviews.author: J. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I was going to return this unit, as I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return this unit, as I bought the wrong one. I requested a refund, and Amazon sent me a return label. My daughter decided she wanted it, so I gave it to her. My daughter has severe allergies, so she used it in the bathroom to intensify the mist in a smaller room. I guess she forgot to turn it off, and when the room filled with shower steam, she went to turn the unit off, and got a shock when she touched the on-off button.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Injection Molding Issues/UPDATED SUPPLIER CORRECTED THE ISSUE
customer_reviews.text: Use 3 times and now the screw on cap won't screw on. The plastic threads literally dissolved somehow? Area where threads are missing has a very high porosity. Looks like injection molding issues. Very disappointing for $40 UPDATE: The supplier contacted me and replaced the unit. The new unit works like a charm! Seems like the issues we had were a one off occurrence. Great customer service, and awesome product! Updated to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Derique

customer_reviews.title: 10 months along and I still love this little thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the 4th ultrasonic humidifier I've bought and I really love it. Yes, it is smaller than others, but it's perfect for my kid's room. I love that it's very quiet and you can unplug just the unit and take to clean or refill it without having to unplug it and drag the wires along. We've had this almost 10 months now and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's All Good!
customer_reviews.text: Kudos to Anypro for such a great product with user-friendly features and for outstanding customer service. For me, it’s all good. ● Compact and efficient, with auto shutoff ● Filterless design ● Detachable 68” power cord with adapter ● Optional timer with 1, 3, & 6 hour settings ● Easy to clean; includes small cleaning brush ● Made with antimicrobial material
customer_reviews.author: Amy Starr

customer_reviews.title: Eliminate Dry Humidity.
customer_reviews.text: Great Humidifier, received it midday, connected in my bedroom where it was registering approximately 17%, by night time it was in the mid 20's. Filled it up before Bedtime, checked in the morning was at 35%.
customer_reviews.author: TazmeTony

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect size for my daughter's room
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my original review to 5 stars! Customer service reached out to me and sent me a new unit to replace my defective unit and I couldn't be happier with the results. It works perfectly! I'm buying one for my orchids too! Runs for an entire day or night. Though I have to fill it once or twice a day it is super easy to fill. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Mister
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged, great instructions, good features (low, high, timer, night light), and quiet too! Good for end table use at the side of the bed for one person and lasts several nights before it needs refilling. Just get one.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Great size; Hard to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this when I first bought it, but after about a week, the plastic around the container where you fill the water was already cracking. On top of this, it was very difficult to keep clean and to clean it well; lots of small areas that you can't get to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome to clean but has good output
customer_reviews.text: The way it is constructed, it makes it a little difficult to clean. Outside of that, I like the fact that the unit does not have a filter to replace. You just have to clean it weekly. In regards to the output, for a unit its size, it's pretty good I think.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: We had it on 24/7 for about 9 days and it worked great. When filled to the top on high
customer_reviews.text: Used this for when my daughter had her tonsils out. We had it on 24/7 for about 9 days and it worked great. When filled to the top on high, it would last about 8-9 hours before it needed to filled. On low probably closer to 12.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well for my small bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for my small bedroom. I haven't tried it in a larger room yet. When I press the button 3 times as instructed for the 6 hour timer, the product shuts off. I would provide more clear instructions for the 1,3, and 6 hour timer settings as nothing on the humidifier is labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

product_meta.title: Anypro Cool Mist Humidifier, Ultrasonic Super Quiet Air Diffuser with Silver ion Antibacterial Agent, 3 Time Settings High/Low Control and Night Light Ideal for Baby Bedroom, 0.5 Gallon, Blue
feature_bullets: Cool Mist Humidifier: Advanced ultrasonic technology safely moisturizes the air for 10-16 hours of continuous operation with 2-liter capacity(depending on mist control setting) so you can breathe easily and maintain the ideal humidity level
Optional Timer Settings: The timers set the humidifier at 1/3/6 hours per your demand before turning the humidifier off automatically
High / Low Mist Levels: Adjusts the mist output to fit the room humidity and your comfort level
Detachable Power Adapter：Makes it easier to pour water out instead of carrying the cord around
Soft Night Light: Optional relaxing blue night light makes it suitable as a nursery humidifier for kids

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars358 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: This humidifier is covered with 365 days warranty including any components and free lifetime technical support from the date of purchase. Please contact us at support@anyproglobal. Com if any concerns.
